roleset.name: clean as if by using a sluice

example.name: transitive
example.text: `` So that 's sculpture '' , commented Argiento wryly , when-2 he hadsluiced down the floor for a week [*T*-2] , `` [*]making mud pies '' .

roleset.name: flow as if a sluice has opened
roleset.note: SLUICE_DOWN-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. No VNcls. (from sluice.02-v)

example.name: unaccusative
example.text: And then came the water -- not rain , but solid sheets that-1 [*T*-1] sluiceddown like water slopping from a bucket .
example.arg: like water slopping from a bucket
